post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since well over a year (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

The following offer is a special for our LET friends, after a long time.
